com.io7m.r2.core

Interface R2RenderTargetType<D extends R2RenderTargetDescriptionType>

  • Type Parameters:
    D - The precise type of render target description used to produce render targets of this type
    All Superinterfaces:
    com.io7m.jcanephora.core.JCGLResourceSizedType, com.io7m.jcanephora.core.JCGLResourceUsableType, R2DeletableType, R2RenderTargetUsableType<D>
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    R2AmbientOcclusionBufferType, R2DepthOnlyBufferType, R2DepthVarianceBufferType, R2GeometryBufferType, R2ImageBufferType, R2LightBufferType, R2MaskBufferType
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    R2AmbientOcclusionBuffer, R2DepthOnlyBuffer, R2DepthVarianceBuffer, R2GeometryBuffer, R2ImageBuffer, R2MaskBuffer

    public interface R2RenderTargetType<D extends R2RenderTargetDescriptionType>
extends R2DeletableType, R2RenderTargetUsableType<D>
    The type of render targets.
